name: RTCPeerConnection.getSenders
description: The RTCPeerConnection method getSenders() returns an array of RTCRtpSender objects, each of which represents the RTP sender responsible for transmitting one track's data.
content: The RTCPeerConnection method getSenders() returns an array of RTCRtpSender objects, each of which represents the RTP sender responsible for transmitting one track's data. A sender object provides methods and properties for examining and controlling the encoding and transmission of the track's data.
